gen:link.msg:message: The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

When RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies is not reported the reported value of RevaluationReserve at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of RevaluationReserve at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, RevaluationReserveMovement. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondNoConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondNoConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SRevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondNoConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

When RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies is reported AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies SHOULD be equal to + RevaluationReserve + RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies - RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptThreeVariables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

When RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies is reported the reported value of RevaluationReserve at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, RevaluationReserveMovement. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EAdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePrecondConceptPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

When RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies is reported then AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies SHOULD exist at least once within the same context. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgAdimPrecondConceptAndExistenceConcept1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

{$RevaluationReserveMovement/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
